nodes.bodyText: Is a wait needed before fetching slow request warnings?

@fmhwong Yeah, its needed, since the test case might automatically fail, even before the slow request warnings are logged. I noticed in some SOE platforms, the test case executes faster, even before messages are logged. So, its better waiting for the message to appear.
I meant you have server.waitForStringInLogUsingMark("TRAS0112W", 10000) in other cases but not here.  The question was "do you need one here"?
Oh okay, no we don't need one here, since the server.waitForStringInLogUsingMark("TRAS0112W", 10000) is in the fetchNoOfslowRequestWarnings() method already for this class.
